programme.desc: Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come facetoface.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Vision its how ninetyfive percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mindblowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a superpower just to survive.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese Kimono
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to kimono. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: 36 From what time to what time can we use the bath? To ask when something is open or available, put wa after the name of something, then nanji kara nanji made desu ka.

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russias invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLDJAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of NHK NEWSLINE and the launch of NHK NEWS 7. We also feature Japan in Focus moving to weekdays.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nations long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: After a lifetimes work, dairy farmer Yoshikawa Yuji was diagnosed with cancer and had to retire. As his son takes over the farm, what joys and struggles does he encounter?

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyoe producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyoe artist Sharakus debut work The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle ziplining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocketpowered ATV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Fertilizer causes Yumis crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs a lot of pizzas, fast! But when Speed Meister steps in, the pups have to fix his pizza problem. When a family cant get to the airport in time on Speed Meisters road, Rubble & Crew has to build a new road before takeoff.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway and Mr. DuckyDoo want to show their skydiving skills. But when wind gets in the way, the pups help them sky dive on the ground! When Wheeler and Truffles the pig cant ice skate, the crew finds a construction solution with wheels!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. Its Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: After a selfish fish takes over the puttputt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion minigolf player to defeat him. Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dads cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And theyll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together literally!, Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pigs house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesnt like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isnt easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Fridas fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildrens attention. Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think hes their mama!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove to Willow that alchemy is more powerful than her natural magic. Brainys new brainweighing invention backfires and leaves him brainless.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When customers bring pets into the Krusty Krab, Mr. Krabs soon realizes pets are more profitable than owners. Plankton ruins another date with Karen, so she puts the Chum Bucket on lockdown until he proves his affection.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fires robot band from Goofy Goobers. Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he wont be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: To save his brothers, Mikey needs the help of Bishops intern, ROD. But Rod wants something in return... to be turned into a MUTANT! To save the day, Mikey has to become... RESPONSIBLE.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of monotonous meals, the kids make a plan to sabotage dinner so they can have pizza. Lincoln and Ronnie Anne have to take care of an egg baby but Lincoln doesnt trust her with the fragile egg.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde submit an Ace Savvy comic to a meetthecreator contest, but are foiled by a surprising nemesis. When Lana brings home a new pet, who the kids adore, the four original Loud pets scheme to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe bring Chloe on an undercover mission to Secret Shores so she can experience life as a normal kid. When a new supervillain threat emerges, the trio must stay in town longer than they anticipated.

programme.title: SLAM

programme.title: LITTORAL
programme.desc: Twice a year, the equinoxes create exceptional tidal ranges that draw impressive crowds. Particularly popular, Saint Malo is home to the worlds most impressive tides, and all the more so during the equinoxes. To better understand the phenomenon, Sophie Ladame meets geologist Odile Gurin under the full moon.
